subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The United States scored three goals in a four-minute span to beat Finland, 3-2, in the quarterfinals of the world championship in Bern, Switzerland. Dustin Brown, T. J. Oshie and Ryan Suter scored midway through the second period and Robert Esche made 47 saves. The United States will play Russia, a 4-3 winner over Belarus, in a semifinal on Friday.
